questions.question: What is double spending in the context of blockchain?

answers.a: A cryptocurrency that has twice the market value.
answers.b: The act of spending the same cryptocurrency more than once.
answers.c: A blockchain with two separate chains.
answers.d: A technique to speed up transaction processing

questions.question: How does a blockchain system prevent double spending?

answers.b: By allowing every user to validate their own transactions.

questions.question: What does the term 'immutable' mean in the context of blockchain?

answers.b: Unable to be changed or modified once recorded.
answers.c: Subject to constant updates and revisions..
